name: Adventures in Anumun
description:
Adventures in Anumun is currently under development.

The assets used in the game are comprised of default assets that come with the RPG Maker MV license, custom edits, custom sprites, original music, and some assets from the RPG Maker community.  If you would like to try out the game while it's in development, please be aware that some areas are not finished. You can play through the starting story and first main mission.  I will be updating the game as I add more content.

All music is credited to Isaria. You can find her work here.

Splinterlands is a game and community built on the STEEM blockchain. You can find out more about it here.

Credit for resources from the RPG Maker Community should be attributed to Avery, hiddenone, Kadokawa, PandaMaru, and whtdragon.
